Package inout

package inout
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    FileObject
    IntelliJ IDEA 2021.2.2 (Ultimate Edition)
    Licensed to Gilberto Rouxinol
    For educational use only.
    Polytechnic Institute of Viseu
    School of Technology and Management of Viseu
    Class created by Gilberto Rouxinol on 2022
    Copyright © 2022 Gilberto Rouxinol
    All rights reserved

    The FileObject class implements a stream file and connect it to an object stream to read or write objects from or for file.
    The FileObject class has the following methods:
    (1) turnOnReader() - open file in read mode;
    (2) objectReader() - read an object in an open file in read mode;
    (3) turnOffReader() - close file in read mode;
    (4) turnOnWriter() - open file in read mode;
    (5) objectWriter() - write an object in an open file in write mode;
    (6) turnOffWriter() - close file in write mode.
    FileText
    IntelliJ IDEA 2021.2.2 (Ultimate Edition)
    Licensed to Gilberto Rouxinol
    For educational use only.
    Polytechnic Institute of Viseu
    School of Technology and Management of Viseu
    Class created by Gilberto Rouxinol on 2022
    Copyright © 2022 Gilberto Rouxinol
    All rights reserved

    The FileText class implements a BufferedReader and BufferedWriter object to read and write from or for a text file.
    The FileText class has the following methods:
    (1) turnOnReader() - open file in read mode;
    (2) textReader() - read a line text in an open file in read mode;
    (3) turnOffReader() - close file in read mode;
    (4) turnOnWriter() - open file in read mode;
    (5) textWriter() - write a line text in an open file in write mode;
    (6) turnOffWriter() - close file in write mode.
    Keyboard
    IntelliJ IDEA 2021.2.2 (Ultimate Edition)
    Licensed to Gilberto Rouxinol
    For educational use only.
    Polytechnic Institute of Viseu
    School of Technology and Management of Viseu
    Class created by Gilberto Rouxinol on 2022
    Copyright © 2022 Gilberto Rouxinol
    All rights reserved

    The keyboard class implements a BufferedReader stream and connect it to an InputStreamReader stream to read line by line from the keyboard instead of using the class Scanner with System.in.
    The keyboard class has the following readers or methods:
    (1) readString() - read a string;
    (2) readFloat() - read a float number;
    (3) readDouble() - read a double number;
    (4) readInteger() - read an integer number;
    (5) readBoolean() - read a boolean value - "true" or "false".
